**User:**
Hey, I'm having some trouble with my Vault. How do I unlock it without revoking and recovering my VerusID?

**AI Assistant:**
Don't worry, I'm here to help. Actually, you can unlock a Vault without revoking and recovering your VerusID. If you chose TimeLock, you can simply wait for the determined period to pass, and the assets will be spendable again. If you chose DelayLock, you can request an unlock and then wait for the cooldown period to pass before the assets can be spent again. Does that help?

**User:**
That makes sense, thanks. I was thinking, though, would it be possible to combine both TimeLock and DelayLock options to lock my Vault?

**AI Assistant:**
Unfortunately, no, you can only choose one option to lock your Vault, either TimeLock or DelayLock. You cannot choose both options simultaneously. You need to decide which one works best for your needs. Do you have any other questions about Vaults or VerusIDs in general?
How do I unlock a Vault without revoking and recovering my VerusID?

Actually, you can unlock a Vault without revoking and recovering your VerusID. If you chose TimeLock, you can simply wait for the determined period to pass, and the assets will be spendable again. If you chose DelayLock, you can request an unlock and then wait for the cooldown period to pass before the assets can be spent again.

ompletely recover those assets into your own control. Read more here on how the revocation and recovery authorities function.
TimeLock & DelayLock
Vault has two different options to lock your assets, TimeLock and DelayLock. You can only choose one option to lock the Vault. And the only way to circumvent a locked Vault is through revoking and recovering the VerusID.
With TimeLock you determine how long you want the Vault to be locked. After the determined period is over the assets can be spent again. The maximum amount of time the Vault can be locked is 21 years.
With DelayLock you determine a cooldown period. You lock the Vault and have to request an unlock. After requesting the unlock you have to wait for the determined cooldown period before the assets can be spent again.
